build.buildCommand: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && DATABASE_URL="${DATABASE_URL:-postgresql://user:password@localhost:5432/db?schema=public}" npx prisma generate || echo "⚠️  Prisma generate falhou, mas continuando..."

deploy.startCommand: cd backend && (if [ -n "$DATABASE_URL" ] && [ "$DATABASE_URL" != "" ]; then npx prisma migrate deploy || true; fi) && npm start
